RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute

RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute Class Reference

#include <optionintattribute.h>

Inheritance diagram for RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute:

[legend]
Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

An option storing a signed int value.

It is used with the OptionManager and may be added to an OptionButton.

Definition at line 44 of file optionintattribute.h.

void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionIntAttribute::controlStep (  )  [protected]

Controls the step.

void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setType ( tOptionAttributeType  t  )  [inherited]

Set the type of the attribute.

Set OptionAttribute::type to t. If the type is OAT_UNKNOWN, a warning log message is sent to the Logger.

See also:
getType(), type.

t The new type of the attribute

void RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::setName ( const char *  n  )  [inherited]

Set the name of the attribute.

Logs a warning message if the name is empty. The control of the lenght of the string is done by std::strlen.

See also:

const char * RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::getToolTip (  )  [inherited]

Get the tooltip text of the attribute.

The name can contains space and other specials character but keep in mind this is used as the label of the option (in LauncherOptions dialog).

See also:
setToolTip(), tooltip

FXObject* RainbruRPG::Options::OptionAttribute::widget [protected, inherited]

The widget linked to this attribute.
